feature.label: ENVIRONMENT MODULE
feature.title: Vozel Engine: Application
feature.description: The Application is a standalone world-building environment focused on authoring voxel content, terrain logic, biomes, and maps.

features.title: Terrain Editor
features.description: A flexible terrain authoring system built on layered procedural logic and spline-based control.

items.title: Spline Editor
items.description: Draw and edit terrain paths (rivers, roads, cliffs); Adjustable width, falloff, and influence.

items.title: Noise Stack System
items.description: Supports up to 5 independent noise layers; Per-noise enable/disable toggle; Adjustable frequency, amplitude, and persistence.

items.title: Custom Noise Functions
items.description: Plug-in custom noise algorithms; Combine noise layers using blend modes.

items.title: Height & Slope Control
items.description: Height clamps and masks; Slope-based terrain shaping.

items.title: Live Terrain Preview
items.description: Real-time terrain updates during editing.

features.title: Biome Editor
features.description: A modular biome system allowing unique terrain logic and environment configuration per biome.

items.title: Biome-Specific Terrain Rules
items.description: Custom noise stack per biome; Independent height and slope behavior.

items.title: Terrain Blending
items.description: Smooth transitions between biomes; Configurable blend radius and weight.

items.title: Biome Variants
items.description: Multiple sub-variants per biome; Randomized selection rules.

items.title: Environment Settings
items.description: Select voxel types for each biome; Biome environment parameters.

items.title: Biome Preview Mode
items.description: Visualize biome distribution and blending.

items.title: Custom Voxel Creation
items.description: Define vertices, faces, normals; Support for non-cube shapes.

items.title: Per-Face Configuration
items.description: Independent face settings.

items.title: Texture Painting
items.description: Paint directly onto mesh surfaces; UV editing per face.

items.title: Reusable Assets
items.description: Save and reuse custom voxel meshes.

items.title: Texture Painter
items.description: Paint textures directly onto voxels.

items.title: Atlas Editor
items.description: Create and manage texture atlases; Grid-based layout.

items.title: Indexing
items.description: Optimized for voxel rendering.

items.title: Validation
items.description: Real-time preview; Atlas consistency checks.

items.title: Voxel Editor
items.description: Configuration of physical and visual properties; Per-voxel texture assignment; Frame-based animated textures with speed control; Metadata tags and custom parameters.

items.title: Construction Editor
items.description: Modular building system; Assemble multi-voxel structures; Snap, alignment, rotation, and pivot controls; Reusable construction assets.

items.title: Map Editor
items.description: High-level composition; Manual voxel terrain drawing; Place prebuilt constructions; Layered editing (terrain, structure, detail); Export to FBX and custom formats.

feature.label: INTEGRATION MODULE
feature.title: Vozel Engine: Unity Plugin
feature.description: The Unity Plugin bridges the editor application with runtime and editor workflows inside Unity.

items.title: Settings File Importer
items.description: Pipeline for terrain, biome, voxel, and texture settings; Map file import into Unity objects; Automatic asset generation (Materials, Meshes, Data assets).

items.title: Procedural World Generator
items.description: Seed-based world creation; Biome-driven generation; Chunk-based structure; Deterministic results; Runtime loading support; Scalable world size.
Optimized voxel mesh generation with face culling.
GPU-friendly data layout; Texture atlas and texture array support.
Compatible with Unity URP; Designed for instanced rendering pipelines.
